alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:42PM CDT until March 23 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HASKELL AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Anson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Avoca around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600 and Tuxedo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
